name: ApplicationDataExchangeAssessmentFrameworkandFunctionalRequirementsforMobileHealth
title: Application Data Exchange Assessment Framework and Functional Requirements for Mobile Health
description: This IG provides an the assessment framework and functional requirements for mobile health devices and apps to support the exchange of observations and other data in support of consumer health monitoring.

resource.name: BatteryChargeRecommendations
resource.description:
The level of battery charge for a device should be reported.

Reporting the battery charge level for a device enables an App to alert
a user that the device needs recharging.

NOTE: Some devices which may be assessed using this guide may have to
meet more stringent requirements to ensure patient safety. That is outside
of the scope of this guide.

resource.name: BpMeasurementRecommendations
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a blood pressure measurement from the user.

resource.name: BpMeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a blood pressure measurement from the user.

resource.name: ClinicalBpMeasurementRecommendations
resource.description:
The system shall be able to capture and report additional data used for clinical interpretation.

To supplement this blood pressure observation, the mean arterial blood pressure should be computed, and the measurement site and
cuff size (where applicable) shall be reported.

resource.name: ClinicalBpMeasurementRequirements
resource.description:
The system shall be able to capture and report additional data used for clinical interpretation.

To supplement this blood pressure observation, the mean arterial blood pressure should be computed, and the measurement site and
cuff size (where applicable) shall be reported.

resource.name: ClinicalHeartRateMeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report additional data used for clinical interpretation.

resource.name: ClinicalHeightAndWeightMeasurementRecommendations
resource.description:
The system shall be able to capture and record other data to facilitate interpretation of
height and weight measurements.

resource.name: ClinicalHeightAndWeightMeasurementRequirements
resource.description:
The system shall be able to capture and record other data to facilitate interpretation of
height and weight measurements.

resource.name: ClinicalSpo2MeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report additional data used for clinical interpretation.

resource.name: ClinicalTemperatureMeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report additional data used for clinical interpretation.

resource.name: CommentRecommendations
resource.description:
An App should allow for recording of additional user supplied data.

Users of a device or app for tracking a particular type of measurement may also want to keep track of additional data
for a measure that is not captured by the device, such as recent physical activity that might affect vital signs readings,
or type of blood glucose reading with respect to time of most recent meal, or site used for a blood pressure reading.

resource.name: CorrectionsRequirements
resource.description:
An App should allow for the user to correct or "delete" incorrect data.

Users of a device or app for shall have the ability to correct or remove incorrect data.

resource.name: DeviceIdentifierRecommendations
resource.description:
The device that performs a measurement shall be uniquely identified.

Each type of device has attributes with regard to precision, accuracy and quality which
can impact the interpretation of measurements taken by the device.  Knowledge of the
device helps greatly in interpreting the results.

resource.name: DeviceIdentifierRequirements
resource.description:
The device that performs a measurement shall be uniquely identified.

Each type of device has attributes with regard to precision, accuracy and quality which
can impact the interpretation of measurements taken by the device.  Knowledge of the
device helps greatly in interpreting the results.

resource.name: DeviceTypeRequirements
resource.description:
The type of device performing the measure shall be able to be determined from the <System>
NOTE: If a device can be associated with a Universal Device Identifier (UDI), it meets the criteria for this
requirement, because this information is included in device metadata accessible via UDI.

resource.name: HeartRateMeasurementRecommendations
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a heart rate measurement from the user.

resource.name: HeartRateMeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a heart rate measurement from the user.

resource.name: HeightMeasurementRecommendations
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a height measurement from the user.

resource.name: HeightMeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a height measurement from the user.

resource.name: ManualEntryDetectableRequirements
resource.description:
If an app enables recording of outside measurements that app shall identify
measures as that have been manually entered by the user of the app, and the
user shall be identified also.

resource.name: MeasurementDeviceIdentifiedRequirements
resource.description:
The device that performs the measurement shall be uniquely identified and that identifier
    shall persist throughout that devices lifetime.

Each type of device has attributes with regard to precision, accuracy and quality that can impact
the interpretation of measurements taken by the device. Knowledge of the device helps greatly in
interpreting the results.

resource.name: NetworkAddressRecommendations
resource.description:
The network address of a device should be reported.

The network address can be the physical network address (e.g., MAC address) or other identifier
assigned to uniquely identify the device on a network (wired or unwired)

resource.name: PhysicalActivityAndSleepRecommendations
resource.description: The system shall record the duration and other qualities of physical activities that it can detect.

resource.name: PhysicalActivityAndSleepRequirements
resource.description: The system shall record the duration and other qualities of physical activities that it can detect.

resource.name: RespirationRateRecommendations
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a respiration rate measurement from the user.

resource.name: RespirationRateRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a respiration rate measurement from the user.

resource.name: SoftwareVersionRecommendations
resource.description:
The Software Version associated with a system should be available.

The Software Version can be the physical network address (e.g., MAC address) or other identifier
assigned to uniquely identify the device on a network (wired or unwired)

resource.name: Spo2MeasurementRecommendations
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a Oxygen Saturation measurement from the user.

resource.name: Spo2MeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a Oxygen Saturation measurement from the user.

resource.name: StandardTerminologyUsedRecommendations
resource.description: If codes are present in measurements, standard terminology should be used for observation codes, values and units.

resource.name: TemperatureMeasurementRecommendations
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a Temperature measurement from the user.

resource.name: TemperatureMeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a Temperature measurement from the user.

resource.name: TimeStampOrDurationRequirements
resource.description:
The time stamp or time period associated with a measurement shall be recorded and reported for each measurement taken,
and the time when the measure was recorded is also tracked.

Note: These requirements are checked for each measurement for which the system is
being assessed.  If the requirement fails for **ANY** measurement, the requirement is considered to not be met.

resource.name: UniqueUserIdentityRequirements
resource.description:
An app/infrastructure shall be able to generate/report the unique identifier for a given user association with a measurement.

This scenario demonstrates the ability of an App to associate a user with an identifier, and in the
process of storing the measurement has associated the measurement with the user's identity.

NOTE: Different kinds of Unique identifiers may be used

resource.name: UnitsRecommendations
resource.description: Fixed values used for units returned by the device or communicated by the App shall be documented.

resource.name: UserBirthSexRequirements
resource.description: If the user's birth sex is essential to compute a measurement, the App/Infrastructure shall be able to associate/report the birth sex of the user.

resource.name: UserContactInformationRequirements
resource.description:
The App or Infrastructure shall be able to associate the user's contact
information (e.g., e-mail, address, phone number) with the user.

resource.name: UserDateOfBirthRequirements
resource.description: The App and Infrastructure shall be able to associate a birth date with the patient.

resource.name: UserGenderIdentityRecommendations
resource.description:
The App and Infrastructure should be able to associate a gender identity (e.g., male, female, trans, non-binary)
with the patient.

resource.name: UserHeightRequirements
resource.description:
If User Height is essential to compute an observation the app/infra shall be
able to capture/report the user's height as an attribute of the user .

NOTE: Information is considered to be essential to compute an observation
when the value of that observation would change if the information changes.
Examples for height include distance traveled or calories used during an
activity (e.g., steps or stairs climbed)

resource.name: UserNameRequirements
resource.description: The App or Infrastructure shall be able to associate the user's name with the user.

resource.name: UserWeightRequirements
resource.description:
If the User's weight is essential to compute an observation the app/infra shall
    be able to capture/report the user's weight as an attribute of the user .

NOTE: Information is considered to be essential to compute an observation
when the value of that observation would change if the information changes.
Examples for weight include calories used during an activity (e.g., steps or stairs climbed)

resource.name: WeightMeasurementRecommendations
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a weight measurement from the user.

resource.name: WeightMeasurementRequirements
resource.description: The system shall be able to capture and report a weight measurement from the user.

resource.description: Allowed codes for Blood Pressure Measurement

resource.description: Allowed values for body height codes

resource.name: BodyHeightUnits
resource.description: Allowed values for body height units

resource.name: BodyTempuratureUnits
resource.description: Allowed values for body tempurature

resource.name: BodyWeightUnits
resource.description: Allowed values for body height

resource.name: CorrectionsAndDeletions
resource.description: Allowed values to support corrections and deletions

resource.name: HeartRateUnits
resource.description: Allowed values for heart rate

resource.name: RespirationRateUnits
resource.description: Allowed values for heart rate
